allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Complete Phase 1-4A implementation

This commit represents the completion of the first four phases of the
Budget Driving School management system.

PHASE 1: Database Foundation
- PostgreSQL database with 8 core tables
- Multi-tenant architecture with UUID primary keys
- Complete schema with foreign key constraints
- Migration system with auto-updating timestamps

PHASE 2: Backend API
- Express.js REST API with TypeScript
- JWT authentication & authorization
- Multi-tenant context middleware
- Input validation & sanitization
- Centralized error handling
- CRUD services for all entities
- ~60 API endpoints

PHASE 3: Frontend Application
- React 18 with TypeScript
- Vite build system
- Tailwind CSS styling
- Multi-page routing
- Component library
- API integration layer
- Admin dashboard and management pages

PHASE 4A: Smart Scheduling Foundation
- 4 new database tables:
  * instructor_availability (recurring schedules)
  * instructor_time_off (vacations, sick days)
  * scheduling_settings (tenant configuration)
  * notification_queue (24hr & 1hr reminders)
- Smart slot finding algorithm with gap detection
- 6-dimensional conflict detection:
  * instructor_busy, vehicle_busy, student_busy
  * outside_working_hours, time_off, buffer_violation
- 17 new scheduling API endpoints
- Vehicle ownership tracking (school vs instructor-owned)
- 30-minute buffer time management
- Comprehensive documentation

Technical Details:
- Backend: Node.js + Express + TypeScript + PostgreSQL
- Frontend: React + Vite + Tailwind
- Database: 12 tables, 60+ endpoints, multi-tenant isolation
- Code: ~1,566 new lines for Phase 4A alone
- Documentation: DEVELOPMENT_LOG.md (1000+ lines)
- Documentation: PHASE_4A_SUMMARY.md (detailed Phase 4A guide)

All systems operational:
- Backend running on port 3000
- Frontend running on port 5173
- Database fully migrated
- All TypeScript compilation errors resolved

Next: Phase 4A frontend components, then Phase 4B (Google Calendar integration)

ðŸš— Generated with Claude Code
EOF
)")
